metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Final Fantasy II - Town is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Final Fantasy II - Town has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Major,  and F Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
